name: AIM
citation: N.D.B. Bruce and J.K. Tsotsos (2006). Saliency Based on Information Maximization. Proc. Neural Information Processing Systems (NIPS)

AIM_filters.description: The feature filter set to be used by the AIM algorithm. In the form [size][name][info], where each filter is size by size in dimension, name is the ICA algorithm used to derive the filters, and info provides a measure of the retained information (higher numbers correspond to more filters).
